content.detailedDescription:
In november, my sister and another cousin of mine and my grandmother were coming back from madison. we noticed there were cops at every turn around spot in the middle of the highway. like litterally 20, and they were all facing the opposite side. on the horizon i noticed what looked like a large ball of light with tiny blue lights surrounding the outside flashing instantaniously. it was just hovering there moving around here and there but basically just in one area. it was really low too.
i don't know if the cops were there for this reason or not, they could have been doing something else, but they were facing the direction of the craft, i found it kind of odd. especially when this ball of light just dissapeared after sitting there for about 15 minutes, all the cops took off in the other direction with their lights on but no sirens.
then after the last of the cops were gone there was this huge flash of bluish/white light everywhere. everyone was like what the hell? we even stopped at a gas station to see if the people there knew anything about it, they didn't, but they also seen the cops and the flash of light, which was about 2 to 3 miles from where we experienced the flash of light.

i'm really, really confused about this. it was the craziest thing thats ever happened to me. my cousins and grandma were all in shock too. i'm not scared or anything like that, i just wish i knew what the heck was going on.

one thing i do know though, is that these police had to have witnessed this event!

i've seen several ufo's outside the town of platteville, wi, where i live.
the way they appear and hover and stay for a couple hours make me feel almost inevitably as if they are just watching us.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Witnessed a ufo and upon dissapearing there was a ball of light, many witnesses, there were many cops in the area that had to of seen this event.

content.detailedDescription: I was comming back from des moines ia. and thought i saw a helocopter till one flew across the front of my truck. i stoped and got out and  stood on the running bord of my truck ,and watched it float away just above the buldings.And there was no sound.Got a good look at it about 15 feet from the front of my truck . i got back to the docks and watched a bunch of them floating around town . and tried to take a photo and my camera died when i zoomed in . it was cold out . so i couldnt stay out any more . they were still there when i left to go home . they were still there when i called my son and had him fill out the form for me online . the time of finishing this report 12:45am. there were still 25+ in the sky i could see .
content.summary: Driving into town thought they were helocopters the one flew across the front of my truck.

content.detailedDescription: About 8 pm i was at my kitchen sink when i noticed lights outside my window-- across the road in a field. at first i thought the were car lights then all of a sudden they flew up over the tree line. then i realized whatever it was had to be one object. then it flew back and forth repeatedly over the path it had came as though it was searching for something and i saw it had a strobe light on the top and a light on the bottom, so there were two lights on the front like "headlights", then the strobe and the bottom light. then all of a sudden another set of lights came up over the tree line as the other seemed to be landing. then the first lights shot back up as the other set flew away. the first set of lights seemed to then follow along. i could see them no more after about 45 minutes of watching. then i was back at my sink about 15 minutes later and saw them again above the tree line "searching" again. i don't think they were helecoptors because the moved differently than a helecopter would. then they just blinked away into the night toward the east and poof they were gone. i dont have a camera or i would have got proof. but i was really freaked out. whatever they were they were very bright and the strobe was white then blinked orange/red and the other lights were not blinking but very bright white lights.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 2 strange bright blinking lights flying over and around the trees.

content.detailedDescription: Went into the woods with a friend on seeing object touch down.   a small hole in the shrub we were able to peer in.A strip of metallic metal was visable,writings of unknown origin.Went to stand up was struck by a ploom of light.I woke up inside of craft with freind present on a table.I looked around as much as i could,noticing a braid like pattern of wires running throughout the floores and ceiling. i was made to stand up i sat on a dull white plastic stretcher with no wheels it floated on its own.Was moved to table and examined.Something extracted from body.Was made to sit down again for a second.Three aliens,to shorter ones.Tallest one was the boss communicated to us telapathiclly.Examination painful,held down during examination.Asked if we could see other world,was granted permission.Sat down again in chair put hands on two patterns one for each hand,when i touched them arms sucked up to elbows chin pressed to some type of chin holder,feet no stapped.Peering out of a circle window left atmosphere felt gforces,came to edge of planet.When we got closer trees exactly like oures were present.Seen objects living beings were present.When i was actually in visual range i observed 4to5 beings,they were so ugly i began to scream i wan to go home over and over again crying tears from my face these beings were from diffrent places it seemed they were jumping at the craft like they wanted to go home.I was extremely afraid by this time crying out of control arms still strapped in finally they let us go when i turned around an looked it was a black pyramid just like glass.A cap of silver for the tip a band of silver at the bottom.Light came out of it inside of it all around it changing colers all the time.Colers seemed to blend on top of itself,i was amazed.How could i have fit in such a small space it was only about 8 feet tall maybe four feet wide.A face looked at me through the transparent black like glass pyramid and one stepped out looking at me again i ran as fast as my feet would take me fearing i would get dumped off somewhere.We ran home and called the police here in muskegon county michigan,a report was filed along with all the other sightings that week. i feel like my encounter was the most significant in ufo history.I could go into more detail,but i did not want to take away from the whole story i would like to sit down with investigaters,and maybe take them to where it happen before that land is developed into housing.It was really hard to write this without crying,i am a 37 year old african american,iwas 17 years old when it happen.This significant because i beleive it is the same pyramid that has been seen in the midwest over and over again lately.
content.summary: Watched a craft land. went to where it was and was abducted 2hr.

content.detailedDescription:
I was out in my backyard, which is pretty high up and near the mountains. all around us we see various mountain ranges. i was waiting while my dog went out and to my left a flashing object in the sky caught my attention. we have many planes and helicopters fly over from time to time or that can be spotted in the sky, but this was unusual. i began watching it and noticed it appeared to hover over the mountain top. it was at about 15 degrees above the horizon and in the north northwest area. it was flashing white lights in what seemed like a circular motion and then occasionally another color or two would come in like a green/blue, maybe red. i know most airplanes have red and green lights, as do helicopters but the pattern and flashing of the lights wasn't typical of either. the object hovered above the mountain top for a few seconds and then i noticed it was beginning to descend. the object began moving at a very smooth pace. it began to disappear behind the frame of our gazebo and i moved to follow it the best i could. it continued to descend and eventually i lost it behind the mountain range. i haven't seen it since. what was unusual about it is i have seen plenty of planes and helicopters fly over those mountains but never disappear or hover above them. it could simply be some odd landing or occurrence but it definitely is unidentified. right after it disappeared i waited to see if it would come back up, unfortunately it did not. i then came in and spoke to my dad about it, who tried to take a very scientific approach to the issue. he went outside with me and i told him what i had seen and then re-enacted the event and even he said it didn't sound like anything he was familiar with. 

1. i was in my backyard in south corona, ca taking my dog outside. 

2. i first noticed the object when i saw the bright and unusual flashing lights out of the corner of my eye. 

3. when i first noticed it i thought it was probably an airplane that just happened to be at an odd angle with really bright lights. 

4. it was moving at a very calculated pace and didn't seem to do any strange or odd movements except that it smoothly descended straight down and behind the mountain range toward the chino hills/yorba linda area, which i am not familiar with any aerial objects doing in this area. and there are plenty we have seen flying around.

5. i felt intrigued. i am always looking up at the skies, day and night and its always interesting to see something out of the ordinary. i was excited to be quite honest but also disappointed i couldn't get a better view of it to know more of what it could be. it also disappointed me when it disappeared behind the mountain range. 

6. i unfortunately lost sight of the object when it descended behind the mountain range.
content.summary: A bright flashing aerial object spotted descending straight down, directly behind mountains.

content.detailedDescription: It was july afternoon when i had been arguing with my father things got heated so me and my fiance had decided to go and take a walk to calm things down a little bit. we started walking down our country road and we were talking to each other trying to pass the time as we walked down the long country road. we had decided walk to my fiances parents house. it was a six mile walk so we took about 3,  15minute breaks. and about halfway there we had noticed that it had started to get dark out so we tried to hurry up before it got dark. we had tried to pass time by finding star formations like the big dipper and orion and orions belt. it was pretty dark and everything silent and still and there had not been any traffic at that point. as my fiance walked i still stared at the stars both not speaking just walking at that moment i had noticed a large orange/red light that blinked itself into existance thinking nothing nothing of it i was about to look away when out of nowere in a curved line. more orbs one by one apeared one after the other until there was a total of five, shock instantly filled me. at that moment i knew it wasnt no airlplain! i shouted for my fiance to look at the objects in the sky and the objects seemed to be hovering there not moving. she didnt like what she saw and wanted to leave quickly and at that time i was still watching the objects in the sky. she was a little scared at what she saw and started to walk at a fast pace to hurry and get to her parents house. as i looked up again the strange orbs instantly shot and darted around each other, one shot instanly from left to right without hesitation then vanished. i hurried down the road almost to my destination trying to calm my fiance down. at this time there was still no sound it was unnatuarally quiet. i looked to see if the lights were still there but they vanished, then out of nowere an extremly lound unatural skreech that sounded like it was right next to my head which made me and my fiance stop dead in our tracks and every hair in my body stood srait up at that time we were both frightened i looked around but didnt see anything but we started to run quickly to her parents house at that time we were almost there and still didnt see anything and then we finally made it there.It left us with an uneasy feeling.
content.summary: Me and my pregnant fiance were walking down a road when multiple large unknown orbs shot and darted in the sky followed by a terrifying sound.

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking pictures out the window of my plane.
with a disposable camera
i never visually seen anything. 
but last week when i was going through my photo dvd i found a picture of an object over chicago. the uploaded picture is a raw unedited photo.
not much to look at, just looks like a line with an orb below it.
the mark on the left side of the photo is a defect in the lens. 
i've uploaded two pictures taken seconds apart both out the same window at different angles. i can not elaborate on this sighting as i did not physically see this object. first frame is the one with the object,
second frame it is gone. not much distance between the two.
content.summary: Taking pictures out the window of our plane over chicago.

content.detailedDescription: "bright spots" in clouds appeared as saucers with rainbow like "cooling tower" formations above them in photo. not noticeable to the naked eye. my friend who took these photos said she felt "compelled" to keep returning to the window to take photos. she noticed these shapes in the photos and at first noticed only the ones on the left. the one more toward the center of the picture was noticed in the photo only.
content.summary: 4 saucer like objects appeared as bright spots in the sky. showed up in photos.

content.detailedDescription:
First sighted object while driving westbound on pa route 422-it was surrounded by 7 or 8 aircraft which appeared to be helicopters, south of the highway. 
the object got my attention due to its odd attitude (vertical and slightly tilted to one side, illuminated, and just odd and non-aircraft looking)as well as the number of aircraft moving with it.
object and aircraft continued west and seemed to pause near limerick nuclear power station, and i passed them at this point.

after exiting at pa route 100 south i regained sight of object and followed it. the object came to rest over wooded area between french creek state park (which lies in both berks and chester counties) and camp nueva esperanza area in north coventry township, chester county. remained brightly lit and stationary for at least 25 minutes. meanwhile, a series of 3-4 jets (probably military, seemed to have dual horizontal tail fins and lights )alternately made slow wide turns around the object's location during the entire time (i had first mistaken these jets for commercial aircraft on approach to philadelphia international airport, and in fact spotted at least one commercial aircraft heading that way). one of the aircraft made a closer approach to the object than the others. eventually the object moved slowly westward toward the french creek park area, as did the aircraft circling it. i lost sight because it got further west and i do not know the back roads in the northern chester / berks area. was still brightly lit when i departed.

object's shape looked like a helicopter hanging from its front end , i.E. cockpit at top and tail at bottom. light was much brighter and a bit yellower than the surrounding stars. although the aircraft engines were audible as they circled the object had no discernable sound at all.  

i will add that someone i mentioned this to stated that he had seen a large, illuminated non-moving object in the sky when departing the philadelphia waterfront area at approximately 5:45 that evening.

i felt nothing particularly threatening about this object, but definitely felt it was not a conventional craft.
content.summary: Slow moving oval or teardrop radiating bright halogen- like light.

content.detailedDescription: I have arrived home helping my brother move. i looked up at the sky and an airplane was cerculating a area of sacramento continuesly. no lights were  as if to look for sombody, except the blinking lights, so i know it was not from the police. no helecopters circulating that area. out of the blue 3 or more of the same planes were circulating other parts of  sacramento, and it seemed them like they were looking for somthing. the same exact look alike planes from what it seemed. i heard a few years back that sacramento could used as a pretext to invade iran either by launching a device in it or somthing else, and blaming iran for a attack on us. so i belive the  surveillance is to prepare an area for such thing, but this is just my opinion. somthing seriously is going on in sacramento, becasue this is the second time i see this thing going on this year. no police planes of helecopters, but  surveillance planes in particular areas. there is either one or more planes at one time. without any light on circulating an area around sacramento. somthing very suspicously always comes up when i see those planes like somthing is about ot happen over sacramento. i asked my sister in law what those planes were and she didnt know. so that would be the only witness i have.
content.summary: Airplane  surveillance  of sacramento

content.detailedDescription: As i was riding to my brother house in brentwood california, a town in between stockton and antioch. i could not stop my eyes from looking out the window. 7 airplanes flying parallel to each other around diablo mountains. while other planes were circulating the mountain at the same time. after arriving to his house i found a dark spot to look at the sky and listen to the night sky santing to find out what kind of planes they are, and as one zoomed by i could hear a sound of somthing likesomthing resembeling bomber planes. after helping my brother the next day, driving home aproximetly at eight pm. the same scenerio appeared. this time more like 9 planes flying parallel to each other. circulating what seemed to be the modesto or merced area. at a point somthing resembeling a bright star showed up in the area sorrounded by those planes  this object was frozen in the air. after about what it seemed like a minute the object dimmed its light of. and i could see it dimmed now litterly standing in the sky and not moving. i am possitive that it was not a plane. after reaching sacramento, those airplanes were flying over sacramento, and circulate certain areas. after about a hour they had vanished.
content.summary: Star like object flashing ligh in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
About 8 o'clock pm by the radio, my now ex wife and i, ages 26 and her 23, were traveling west along m-20 about 4 miles west of hesperia michigan when far off, miles and miles away, west almost due west and just slightly south we both saw a day glow/lime green tiny dot in the sky. in less than 10 seconds it dropped and came directly at us, almost straight on. in what seemed like only a very few seconds it was on us covering literally miles in only a few seconds and it's emense size literally covered and engulfed our 1979 gray chevy pickup. the first fear was of a head on collision. the absolute shock and fear was indescribable. at this point we were both covered in a brilliant and unbelievable lime/florescent green light that completely blocked out any view outside the truck. we were both completely illuminated in green light. at this point i was in complete un describable terror and total shock like i have never known before or since. i turned to my now ex wife literally screaming with out hearing myself, wondering if i was personally going insane or god knows what only to see her in the exact same state i was in. the look of terror on her face was some thing, much like the entire event, that is so vividly etched in my memory.

ok now this is the part that haunts me every day of my life since. my next memory and hers seems like literally a second later from one of shear terror is one of "hmmm that was weird", and looking at her being totally calm and myself the same way. our truck was in the exact same place on the highway going 60 miles per hour just as it was when we were in total terror what seemed like only a split second before. there was on my part no swerving or even time to react before we went from complete shock to hmmm that was interesting. we both watched the green oval object fly off in a south west direction, more southerly than it had approached, over the trees and off into the far distance and up into the sky disappearing from sight as it seemed to climb far off in the distance. we continued the last 3 miles to our house on loop rd.

we did not have a watch or a car clock. when we got home it was 9 o'clock. then i was even more confused. where had the near hour gone? at this point i called the oceana sheriff office and made a report, just in case someone else saw or experienced this. the officer was very nice and took it all seriously and stated " i have known officers that have seen things they couldn't explain too."
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, Over 1 Mile, Unknown
content.summary: Bright green oval approached and left, lost time.

content.detailedDescription:
If i recall correctly, at approximately 9 - 10 pm in late spring of 1968 it appeared as if a star moved.
we came home from an event and while my wife put our daughter to bed i stayed on the front lawn star gazing.  i saw a three star formation and thought it was either the big or little dipper.  in a matter of a minute or two the star in the center began to move.  i went into the house and told my wife, "you've got to see this."  we went outside and the star had moved from where i last saw it to a new position.  incredibly, in about 20 minutes it had moved in a half circle from  a center position to a frontal position on the left (west).  i have no idea what it was but a star doesn't move and at the distance it couldn't have been a craft of any kind.  i cannot fathom a guess as to how many millions of light years away it was but nothing that i'm aware of could move that fast.  i reported this several years ago to some agency but was laughed at.  i know it happened because my ex-wife saw it with me.  i stayed up till dawn waiting to see if it would move any further but it didn't.  i'm not crazy and if i knew who to report it to back in 1968 (it could have been 1969) i would have done so.
thank you for your time.
content.summary: It appeared as if a star moved.

content.detailedDescription:
Dec. 29, 2008
7-7:30 pm cdt, approx.
astronomy club of tulsa
rmcc observatory
mounds, ok

an unusual sighting occurred this evening around 7 ��� 7:30 pm.  there were several club members, astronomy club of tulsa, at the club���s observatory tonight to take advantage of the very good clear sky along with the early setting of a lovely crescent moon.  it was a great night for observing!

i had stopped to get a cup of coffee and was talking with a friend. i was facing east when out of nowhere an extremely bright light appeared in the east.  it was located at an approximate altitude of 50 degrees and was directly between the constellations auriga and orion, directly above canis minor.  when it first appeared, just below elnath in auriga, it was extremely bright, equivalent to if not brighter than venus. venus���s magnitude tonight was at -4.3, which should give you a rather obvious idea as to its brightness.  at first sight the first quick thought that came to mind was the possible passing of an iridium satellite.  but no, even those don���t just pop up out of nowhere. you can always find them and then watch as they brighten up and continue on their marry way until they dim out completely.  simple info for these is easily accessed and in so doing you would know both the time it will appear as well as what direction it will be coming from and going to. the same holds true for the iss. can find it on its orbital track and then watch it as it passes getting brighter and then dimming out to nothing when it finally crosses the terminator.  this one wasn���t anything like either of what i���ve just described.  extremely bright and had one strobe light on top. 

from it���s initial point of appearance it dropped straight down to within what i would estimate as three or four degrees above the star gomeisa in canis minor.  from that point it stopped coming straight down and began to slowly dim as it suddenly was heading straight east.  the strobe on top was in it���s own right unusual due to there not being any position lights or anti-collision lights visible.  it���s very commonplace to all of us to see private planes, airliners even military aircraft flying around at night while we���re observing out at the club���s observatory. on rare occasion we get the pleasure of seeing a blimp or even an ultra-light but they never look like what was seen tonight. private planes, easily determined as to what they are from not only the position light configuration, common amongst all aircraft along with the common sound/noise from their engines. this object produced absolutely no sound of any kind.  nope, not a meteor, no way, meteors don���t have strobes.  it was considered that it may have been a plane and due to its distance from us we may not have been able to hear it. perhaps so but . . . since it was heading directly away from us it only seems logical that we would���ve stood at least half a chance to hear its engines and also make out it���s position lights (red, green). unfortunately, no to all of those possibilities were provided by whatever it was. 
what is most unusual is that it simply appeared out of nothing. if it were a plane, well, they don���t have backup light���s which it would���ve had to have to remain bright as it was moving away from us. not only this but airliners, private planes and military transports or otherwise don���t have a circular/ball shape fuselage to begin with. it remained in this form until it was out of sight in the east. airliners and large military transports landing lights are bright but nowhere near the brightness level that was initially displayed by whatever this happened to be. 

it remained in sight for about thirty seconds at the most until it was finally gone over the eastern horizon.  again, very unusual, most certainly not anything like what we���ve seen time after time in this area. most generally it���s rather easy to see a plane and know what it is ��� especially at night.

once it had disappeared, jokingly, i told my friend we had just witnessed an aurora coming in out of orbit and heading back east to wright-patterson afb.  an obvious reaction after seeing something that we had no idea as to what it was.

have you ever heard of any type aircraft appearing such as i���ve described? if so, it will be a new one to all of us here.  if not, we haven���t the slightest idea as to what it may have been.
content.summary: Extremely bright light, ball shaped, strobe on top, came out of nowhere, dropped straight down then headed east until gone.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my to pick up my sisters kids driving along interstate 45 (gulf freeway) heading north when an object appeared over the freeway. at first i though it was a helicopter since it had a blue and red light on it and remained stationary. as i got closer i realized the this was no helicopter. once again i tried to write it off as an airplane since the area i was in was located to a major airport. it never moved. it sat there hovering approximately 300 feet over the freeway and as i drove closer i realized the object was a rectangular shape with only the two lights on it, being that there was no direct light hitting it i could not make out the color, only the shape. the object was in the same direction as the freeway, long ways, and the lights on it were located on the south side of it. the red on the back left and the blue on the back right. not blinking, not severly bright. at this time i asked my step-son if he saw what i was seeing? he said yeah, what is that? we didn't know what it was? my next instinct was it had to be a ufo! as we drove under it there was no sound no movement! it just hovered there. as i passed the object i kept looking in my mirrors and turning back to look and it still hovered there. as i made exited the freeway, just after passing the object so i could take some photos with my phone, i looked back again it was gone! no sound, no slow drive away, just gone! i couldn't have been the only one to see this thing as i live in a major city and it was right over one of the most heavily traveled freeways in the city? did anyone else see this object?
content.summary: Driving to pick up the kids and ufo appeared out of nowhere over the freeway.

content.detailedDescription: Driving east on secondary hwy> 582 east of hwy. 2 between hwy. 2 and 21.  i noticed 3 lights in the sky above the towers on the hills south of three hills,ab. they seemed to be stationary.  at first i thought they were balloons or gliders but then it occurred to me that it might be a ufo taking place as i pulled over to grab my camera they started to fade out just as i reached out the window a nd took a snap. like they were reading me knowing i was there. yes there were a few minutes there where i thought that it was quite strange they would be so bright on a summers day and not moving. when i first looked at the picture i did not see anything for a couple of days, then one night i looked at the picture with the computer screen tilted away from me. there are 2 spots above the farmhouse and to the right of the tower if you zoom in. now drag the picture right and above the trees you will see a 3rd light, as if it had started to move right when i snapped the picture. when i stuck my arm out the window too shoot the photo i was seeing 3 lights fading out.  like i said when this occurred i didn't think anyone would believe me,i even sent one to coast to coast. but no reply. no wonder it is very hard to see, and they are just dots of light. but htere was something i could sense about the event.
content.summary: Stationary intense white light sphere shaped.

content.detailedDescription: I was taking my dog out to do his thing and i went to the left side of my driveway and noticed a light throught the tree i walked around the tree to see a very bright light up to the south west i looked at it for a min and it didnt seem to move so i lit a cig and watched it that took about 10 min it still didnt move so i went and got some binocs to try to get a better look at it that took a fue mins when i got back out it was still there in the same spot now thats been about 15 min sence i first spotted it i looked in the glasses and it was shakey so i got to the can in the yard to steady my hands then i could see the thing much better at this time the clouds start to come back in but the light was still strong enought to get through most of that thick cloud now at this time the clouds are going by with holes in them so i can get about a min & half look at a time (now i must say that this started at 5:45pm and at 7:30pm the clouds have cleared out and its gone a star would move but it would still be there) the light was like arc welding bright just looking at it but with the glasses it looked as if there were 2 to 3 big lights that seemed to have light beams like beam or arm like coming off of them then the big lights merged togther and the beams formed a thing that looked like a triangle and some tinny ligts were swerling around and while that was happening a small light started wipping all around so fast almost all i could see was were the light had started then a ribon like strobe then were it would stop then it would do it all over again all very fast all around the now tri.Looking thing or light? then the clouds got to thick i kept looking to see when the louds would clear and when they did it was gone if it was a star it would have just moved west a bit but it would still be up there rite???? i must add that up here in the seattle area in which i have lived here for over 50 years we have boing here i know what planes look like in the sky this did not look or act like any plane that i have ever seen
content.summary: Brite light turned to triangle wih small light buzzing around.

content.detailedDescription:
As we drove home tonight my daughter and i both saw a large glowing ball, like a roman candle but much much larger, streaking towards the earth. it did not appear to be very far about the treetops. we drove straight to the the area we thought it might have crashed but didnt see anything.

this was a first for me and i called police and tv news and made a report and so far we are the only ones reporting.

surely other people saw this... i hope.
content.summary: Large ball of light coming down to earth

content.detailedDescription:
12/29/08 @ 6pm i stepped out front of our home. i noticed a bright light in directly across from me. it looked to be the brightest star i had ever seen. i then noticed much smaller strobing objects flying in the sky. these objects strobed white and red. they changed directions but always seemed to move slowly and smoothly. sometimes they would stop in approximately the same place for upwards of 5 minutes. 

approx. one hour later i stepped out front again and the bright light/star i had seen earlier was no longer their. however, the strobing red and white lights were still able to be seen moving throughout the sky. i sepped out about 5 more times between 7pm and midnight and still see the objects coming and going from quite a few different locations. 

at one point there were two that seemed to be following one another. they came from my left and flew a strait path away from me. after a couple minutes the second one changed directions turning right and continued strait in front of me. it reached a point in the sky where i could clearly see it through the trees. it stayed in that spot (exactly where the bright starlike light had been earlier) for about 5 minutes before seeming to travel away out of sight. 

the strange thing about these objects are that they appear similar to a plane at first until they change direction. once they change direction there is no change in the patterns of the lights. it always looks to be strobing red and white no matter which way it turns. there are no difinitive headlights or green lights. also, there is no sound associated with the objects.

i last spotted these objects 20 minutes ago. if you're quick perhaps you can still catch them. hint: try glancing in the skys above the holy spirit hospital in camp hill, pa.
content.summary: Flashing red/white lights moving unsually for past 6 hours.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving toward concord, nh on i-93 south.  at about 7:25pm i looked up in the sky and saw 3 lights that looked to be in a triangular pattern.  it was traveling at a very high rate of speed and passed directly over my truck.  it would have to be about 1500 - 3000 feet elevation.  it was black triangle.  it stood out because it was below the clouds and i could see the outline pretty good because of the contrast between the lighter clouds and darker traingular object.  the lights were white and circular with one at each corner of the triangle.  i saw it for about 15-20 seconds.  there was also a plane of some sort following what looked to be around the same altitude.  it was traveling considerably slower than the first craft.  

there was also no blinking lights that i coud see on the black triangle.

i attached a drawing.  it was quickly down but it looked pretty much like that.  it looked to be a equilateral triangle.
content.summary: Black triangular ship with a light at the 3 corners.

content.detailedDescription:
October 23,2007. 5:45 am. fairfield iowa. jefferson street,approximately 
100 ft. east of 12th street. the weather was clear ,dark and no moon.
stars were visible. 
i was delivering papers and walking back to my vehicle. as i opened the
door, something caught my eye but only briefly, and i looked down to get
in my vehicle. i was thinking what i saw was birds flying at night, the 
street lights reflecting off their bellies. as soon as i looked down, i
looked up again, but i could see no wings flapping. there were no street lights to illuminate them. i saw 3 dull lights and they remained dull
and constant for the duration. day time views would have placed these
lights to the north on a sightline above some trees 3 blocks away when
i first noticed them. 
the lights were going up and slightly to my right at what seemed like a
constant speed, moving to the south. as they got higher, they began to
take on a triangle shape, with 2 lights in front and 1 light in back.
i could hear no noise. i could see no structure. i don't recall any 
stars being blocked out, possibly because i was looking back and forth 
at the lights in front and the light in back. my reaction was just to
stare at the lights. no emotion. but as they got higher, i began thinking,
{cms/jat/pd} i was seeing something that members of my family had even
seen. 
jefferson street to the east of me is a hill. as the lights reached a 
point above me, i was looking up 70 to 75 degrees from level. the crest
of the hill is illuminated by a street light, and i could still see it 
in my field of vision while looking up at the lights. the distance
between the front lights and the back light was greater than that of 
the street. i estimate the lights were 1/8 to 3/16 mi. high.
there is a tree to my southeast, 25 to 30 ft. away, 30 to 35 ft. tall.
the front lights disappear behind the tree and i focus on the back light.
the back light appeers to pick up speed before going behind the tree, and
i see no more of it. total time about 15 seconds.
after a few more seconds i felt elation at seeing this, wondering what
it was, and thinking if some human has this technology, they need to share 
it with the rest of us and say "screw opec".
content.summary: Close encounter of the first kind.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was in my backyard and as always i looked up into the night sky to see the stars. all of a sudden a very bright white light appeared and then took off. i believe this might be a vortex or something because i see them almost everyday. i see them in the night and the day. usually in the north sky. sometimes there will be just pin points of light real fast and other times there will be streaks of light. the first time i saw it i came in the house and told my husband i had just seen a ufo. i was excited now i can't help but to look everyday and night and i  usually see something within 10 minutes of looking. i don't have a digital camera. if i did i would try to take some photographs. anyone in my area could probably see them too if they look. i must warn you they are extremely fast in and out in less time than you can blink.
content.summary: Extremely bright white flash of light.

content.detailedDescription: A friend and myself were traveling down old dixie hwy. toward hwy 41 (due west).  at 9:18 pm my friend asked me the time and i looked at the clock as we debated on if we were going to the gym the next morning.  we traveled approximately 0.5 miles when suddenly over the roof of the vehicle we saw a very bright fast moving sphere.  it didn't seem to be very high, and living close to a small airport, i can usually recognize rough height and distance of crafts in the sky.  however, this situation is a bit different, as the bright light didn't seem to be more than 50~70 ft. above the ground and i have never witnessed anything moving so quickly.  there wasn't a noise, not a trail following the light, just a fast moving bright orb heading due west.  then it disappeared over the adjacent treeline.  the total time we saw the object was appoximately 2~3 seconds.  it was traveling too low and much too fast to be a small airplane, as there is an airport approximately 3 miles due north of the sighting.  i have never been freightened of anything i have seen in the sky before, but i turned to my friend and he said "what the hell was that!"  i said "i don't know," so to feed our curiousity we drove straight toward the direction of the object, turned south onto hwy 41 drove 0.5 miles and circled back to the origin and didn't see the object again.  i asked my friend "ok, that object was clearly in the sky, correct?"  he replied "yes."  i said "can you identify that object?"  he replied "no."  i said "i want to report this, and hopefully someone else saw the same thing.  as i type this, hairs are standing up on my neck, as i can't explain what i just witnessed.
content.summary: Bright sphere, high speed, low to the ground.

content.detailedDescription: Travelling south on rte 3a in litchfield nh after dining out in bedfordnh wmy wife and i were about to take the left turn for hillcrest road in litchfield toward our home in londonderry, when my wife yelled to me "what is that?!" i looked up  to see a large glowing green spherical object on an east to west trajectory moving at what appeared to be a low arching altitude across the sky. when the object got even with my view of the road i was on it just went dark and dissappeared. i hesitated in order for us to see if there would be some explosion of to the west toward the city of nashua or over the merrimack river but i did not see any and then went home and reported what we saw to the litchfield police. there was another vehicle behind me that must have seen this event but i did not stop as we were both shook up a bit by what we witnessed.
content.summary: Glowing neon green fireball

content.detailedDescription: Around the end of july or the beginning of august in 2008 i stepped out onto my back deck to let my new puppy out to go to the bathroom. it was a very quiet night and the sky was clear. the only sounds were crickets and the sound of semi tractors traveling down interstate 65 which is about 4 miles from my house. as i looked up i noticed what at first i thought was an airplane traveling from southeast to the northwest. i saw three solid orangish lights in a triangular shape. the lights did not blink or change shape or color. the object was low enough that during the day you could easily identify what type of plane it was if it were a plane. the object traveled relatively slow overhead. i would expect if the object were a plane it would traveled overhead in a matter of seconds however the object took 3 or more minutes to pass. the sound of the object made a sound similar to a jet engine except it was intermittent. it nade a swoosh sound like a jet engine for about 2 or 3 seconds then it died down to where you could hear nothing but the crickets. then about 2 or 3 seconds later the jet sound came back. this continued until the object was completly out of sight. i have been in the military for 20 years and live just outside a national guard training post. i have seen all types of aircraft, various types of jets and helicopters and this was nothing like i had ever seen before. i just sttod there and stared at the object. i didn't want to go in and try to find a camera or wake my wife because i was afraid the object would have passed before i made it outside.
content.summary: Three solid orange lights with intermitent sound.

content.detailedDescription:
i was walking back from my mail box and i notice a bright object that was very low. it was in the south west and was much brighter than any star i have seen before.
   the object was very bright white light all around and there were pulsing blue and red lights coming from the center. on the bottom ends were red pulsing lights on the right and let side.
   the object also appeared to hover and move side to side. also it would go from very bright to dim then bright again. i estimated that it was near the north carolina state line area which would put it near a small town called como , nc.
   my wife also viewed the object for a short while and notice the pulsing lights as well coming from the center of the object. i view  the object for about 15 minutes until i could no longer see it due to the trees.
   try to take pictures of the object, but the digital camera stated not recognize file format.
   it may had been nothing but a star, but never seen one move that fast in the short time viewing.


larry green
content.summary: View it above tree top and in a few minutes it was below the tree level.

content.detailedDescription:
No doubt you are getting loads of mail after the show, so i'll keep this quite brief.
 
i live in southchurch, essex, england and one october night about 10 years ago i was in my garden looking at the stars.  i didn't see a craft, i saw a whole planet go by.  i know it sounds crazy, but this thing was just like you see earth from space except that it had reds and oranges on it as well as blue and green.  if i hold my arm in front of me and balance a football on my hand, that was about the size of it, yet it was far away above the rooftops. it was totally silent and had a short finite trail behind it. it followed an arc across the sky. i have rooftops surrounding my house and it appeared, it seemed, above my next door neighbours roof and carried on in an arc till it disappeared behind the roofs in the next street.  given the angle it was travelling i totally expected to hear it crash.

the whole sighting lasted just a few seconds, during which i was too amazed and stunned to say anything. just as it disappeared, i managed to say something and my partner turned and just caught sight of the trail.
 
i have just heard a very similar description on coast to coast and that has given me the impetus to contact you. 
 

 
sue x
content.summary: Planet like earth following a silent arc.

content.detailedDescription:
after leaving dinner with my fiancee we pulled onto fort street, between pennsylvania and eureka roads, on the border of southgate and wyandotte, mi, heading north to go home.  it was approx. 8:15pm on sunday, december 28th, 2008.

  i then spotted out of the windshield of our vehicle to the northeast, four bright, solid orange points of light high in the sky in a type of vee formation.  they were slowly travelling easterly(toward canada).  i first assumed that they were helicopters from selfridge afb but, they started to loop around each other(as if tumbling) and go in different directions relative to each other but generally staying close together.  i then pulled the vehicle over and got out of the car.  i listened for any noise of engines or the such.  it was totally quiet. there were no noises to be heard.  we then proceeded to watch the four lights as they progressed eastward, continually looping and turning around each other until one by one they faded out of sight.  they never changed color nor did they blink at all. this went on for approx. 3-5 minutes.
 
  when they faded out we i got back into the car and we headed home. i have seen alot of meteors, space debris, shooting stars, ect. in my life but i have never seen anything like this.  it was quite fascinating. i'm not saying that this was definately a ufo or not, but we still seen these lights in the sky that i could not explain and i wanted to pass this along to you.

   thank you,
    scott pruit
    aircraft technician
    ford motor company
content.summary: Bright, orange lights over southgate/wyandotte, mi.

content.detailedDescription: I was heading back from a football game in abline that day, i was traveling south on hwy 84 near the small town of novice when i noticed in the eastern sky a white object in the sky, at first thought it was a plane but it did not move like a plane, it would move but not much, pretty much stayed in the same area. a cold front had came through the area around 4:00 pm that day and it was cloudy and pretty high winds from the north.  stopped in coleman for about 15 minutes did not think any more about it, was headed se out of coleman on hwy 84 towards santa anna and looked to the ne and i seen the same object. i did not stop and look at it, was for some reason in hurry to catch the second half of the cowboys.  just curious if anyone else seen the object.
content.summary: Bright white star like object in sky.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife woke up (with the baby) alittle before 5 am and wispered excitedely to me..'there's a ufo outside'. {outside the window, faceing west, with the 'star' at sw)       i saw the object and saw the flashing red, but i was sure that it was just a red pulsar.  i watched for a while (20 minutes) and saw no movement.  my wife reported that it had sattelites around it, i still couldnt see anything real strange.  i went to go get binoculars but still couldn't see much more.  she, my wife, says that its closer to the upper transmission line. (it was between two power lines) i couldn't tell so in my mind i drew a 90 degree cross through it and both of the powerlines, making two right tringles with the power lines.  i would say then that the 'star' was 40 % closer to the upper line and before i knew it, it was more at a 20% point. now this meant that it was traveling from west to east and i decided that it's movement couldnt be explained by the earth's rotation, i guessed that i had to believe my wife that it dipped down and back up again. 
       i then see it move around, about as much distance as a silver dollar held at arm's length, back and forth and up and down.   it held still again and i went downstairs to get my camera.  when i got back it was now 4-6 inches (at arm's length) west.   i tested my camera but i couldn;t find the tripod.  the camera (purchased in 2000) couldn't get much more than a white dot so i didn't record much.  over an hour or so more (2+ hours total) it slowly traveled west (in line with the power line, pretty much in parallel travel with it)  with some stops and variant movements (again mostly l and r but also circles, up and down)  as it fades into the distant western horizon, and behind a tree, i decide to go back to sleep feeling confident that i would (could) see no more, (believe me if it were above 0 deg f i would have gone outside)

final assesment:
not a star!    
other assements:   it would be easy to say that it was behaving non-chalont (sp?)  like it didn't want to be noticed.... the stationary times, the very slow travel west,,
but the erattic movements were like it was trying to regain controll (of the ship).

ps .. at last: what my wife says was that there were white lights coming off of it and orbiting around it,  i did think i saw small specks of light come off it but wvery time i tried to look again i couldnt see them for long...
content.summary: Mostly stationary (looked like a red pulsar), with times of wobble and "random" movement.
